analysisInProgress.message: Analysis in progress. Start browsing on the current tab, then come back here to get stats !#Analysis in progress message

carIndicator.message: Km by car#Label for car indicator

csvColumnsLabel.message: Date;Url;Uncompressed size(b);Compressed size(kb);DOM;GES Data Center(gCO2e);GES Network(gCO2e);GES Device(gCO2e);GES Total(gCO2e); GES Score; Grade; Country; CarbonIntensity; NumberRequest#csvColumnsLabel

eitherFor.message: Either for #Label for informations about visits part. 1

firstResults.message: First results received !#First analysis resulted have been computed.

gesZone.message: Server location#Give the country where the server of the website is localized

infoMix.message: Your emissions depend on the energy mix of the country in which you are located, and in which the website is hosted. This energy mix can vary from hour to hour and season to season:#Infos pour comprendre l'impact du mix énergétiques

launchAnalysisButtonWithAutoScrollButton.message: Auto Scrolling#Launch Analysis with auto scroll

menuText.message: GreenTrackr V1.0.2 is install in your browser and accessible via the devtool panel (F12 or CMD + ALT + i sur Mac#Text when you click on the plugin's icone

nbRequest.message: Number of requests without extentions 'real (cache)'#Number of request made by the website

noFullData.message: Localisation (Server ou User) undefined, use simulator for show results

numberVisit.message: Number of visits#Label for visit indicator

pageTotal.message: Page total#Total GES emissions of website

paramRetryDescription.message: Set the maximum number of attempts to avoid errors in computing HTTP requests for the websites you want to analyze.

paramTokenCo2Description.message: GreenTrackR uses the 'CO2signal' API from Electricity Maps. To use this API, you need an access token, you can get it on the following link 'Go to api portal' -> #https://www.co2signal.com/
